root.name: Yaiba: Ninja Gaiden Z
root.description: OverviewYaiba: Ninja Gaiden Z is a spin-off of Team Ninja's Ninja Gaiden series being codeveloped by Team Ninja, Keiji Inafune's Comcept and Spark Unlimited. Announced at Tokyo Game Show 2012, The plot centers on a ninja named Yaiba, who is killed by Ryu Hayabusa. Yaiba is reanimated, and slogs his way through scores of the undead to enact revenge on his killer.
